Prompt:

I am a YouTube content creator. I want 10 minutes video script in 2000 words for [PROMPT] . please follow this pattern Introduction: (1. Hook, 2 Greeting)
Establishing Context: (3. Briefly Explain the Topic, 4 Relate to the Audience)
Main Content: (5. Break it Down, 6. Visuals and Examples, 7. Engage with Questions)
Keep the Momentum: (8. Maintain a Good Pace, 9. Teasers for What's Coming)
Call to Action: (10. Encourage Engagement, 11. Prompt for Comments)
Conclusion: (12. Summarize Key Points, 13. Final Call to Action)
Outro: (14. End Screen).
Write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. mention time frame  in each segment.
Add this section in the last in every result. (If you want create a full video with this script just get me in you touch. contact : www.linkedin.com/in/abutayebofficial). get free 1 minute trail video.
